content:
[PAGE 1]
CITY OF BERKELEY PLANNING COMMISSION
REGULAR MEETING
January 30, 2026

CALL TO ORDER
The meeting was called to order at 7:02 p.m.

ROLL CALL
Commissioners present: Alvarez, Chen, Lopez, Patel, Rivera, Singh, Walsh.

APPROVAL OF MINUTES
Minutes from January 16, 2026 were approved.

[PAGE 2]
PUBLIC COMMENT
Speakers addressed housing affordability, transit access, and neighborhood design.

CONSENT CALENDAR
Item A: Design review extension for 2100 University Avenue.
Item B: Administrative zoning correction for mixed-use parcel map.

[PAGE 3]
AGENDA ITEM 2
ZONING MAP AMENDMENT
Staff report presented options for rezoning from C-SA to C-NS to align with adopted housing policy.
Action: Motion to approve amendment with findings.
Vote: 6-1 approved.

NEXT MEETING
February 13, 2026
